stories.original_headline: This CRISPR breakthrough turns genes on without cutting DNA
stories.original_summary: A new CRISPR breakthrough shows scientists can turn genes back on without cutting DNA, by removing chemical tags that act like molecular anchors. stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Discover Gentle Magic to Awaken Dormant Life Threads!
stories.fantasy_story: The Alchemists' Guild has unveiled a remarkable new enchanting art. Instead of severing life threads, they can now gently remove invisible binding runes that silence them. This discovery allows dormant vital essences to awaken, promising a safer way to mend the living.

stories.original_headline: Plants can’t absorb as much CO2 as climate models predicted
stories.original_summary: CO2 can stimulate plant growth, but only when enough nitrogen is available—and that key ingredient has been seriously miscalculated. stories.fantasy_headline: Seers Miscalculated Earth's Vital Dust for Greening Kingdoms!
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Seers' Guild has revealed a grave error in their ancient scrolls. While the sooty air from dragon-forges aids greenfolk growth, it requires ample Earth's vital dust, which was overestimated. This means the forests cannot calm the sky's heat as much as once thought.

stories.original_headline: This robot companion is a cameraman for your pet
stories.original_summary: For a long time, tech companies have pitched pet cameras as a way to find out what your furball is up to when you're not home. stories.fantasy_headline: New Enchanted Construct Films Your Loyal Beast's Adventures!
stories.fantasy_story: The Artificers' Clan has unveiled a wondrous new mechanical minion named Vex. No longer must you wonder what your furry companion does while you're away! This enchanted construct follows your loyal beast, using its spirit within the gears to capture images of their daily capers.

stories.original_summary: Birdbuddy is introducing two new smart bird feeders: the flagship Birdbuddy 2 and the more compact, cheaper Birdbuddy 2 Mini aimed at first-time users and smaller outdoor spaces. stories.fantasy_headline: Enchanted Bird Tables Help Novices Observe Feathered Friends!
stories.fantasy_story: The Feathered Friends Guild has presented wondrous new enchanted bird tables! The Birdbuddy Two and its smaller kin are perfect for apprentice bird-whisperers. These magical devices boast improved scrying lenses, making it simpler than ever to observe the kingdom's delightful winged creatures.
